title: 1.14之后怎么自定义刷怪笼的刷怪数量和范围
author: 温暖°

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 FHC红石 于 2019-8-29 11:58 编辑 

我从刷怪笼里data get获得的数据，没变就是没变啊，可以生成僵尸啊
我刚刚开游戏试过了，可以生成僵尸
/setblock ~ ~ ~ spawner{MaxNearbyEntities: 6s, RequiredPlayerRange: 16s, SpawnCount: 4s, SpawnData: {id: "minecraft:zombie"}, MaxSpawnDelay: 800s, Delay: 402s, SpawnRange: 4s, MinSpawnDelay: 200s, SpawnPotentials: [{Entity: {id: "minecraft:zombie"}, Weight: 1}]}

replies.author: 温暖°
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2019-8-29 11:20
和以前一样
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-210097-1-1.html
兄弟，并不是，这个指令在新版本没用

replies.author: 温暖°
replies.txt_content: 可以的，这下没问题了，谢谢大佬
